manual.htmlcs.description: A & AA Rules that are not detected at all by HTML_Codesniffer engine (used by Pa11y and Webval) - see https://squizlabs.github.io/HTML_CodeSniffer/Standards/WCAG2/

kdl-manual.description: Important rules not detected at all by automated detection engines and relevant for typical KDL websites. See https://blog.usablenet.com/automated-wcag-testing-is-not-enough-for-web-accessibility-ada-compliance and https://squizlabs.github.io/HTML_CodeSniffer/Standards/WCAG2/

role.P.description: Issues related to content editing and assigned primarily to project Partners - See https://www.w3.org/WAI/EO/wiki/Content_Author_Responsibilities_Mapping
